fields.name: Tasty Treats (Passive):
fields.value: You are aware of all animal-themed roles present in the game. This role can only spawn if at least one non-mafia animal-themed role is present or will be present.

fields.name: Salt and Pepper (1x, Charge 65%):
fields.value: Target a player. If they have an animal-themed role, they will permanently be considered prepped by you.

fields.name: Time to Eat:
fields.value: Target a player you've prepped. You may choose to rampage attack that player, or attack all of their visitors (but not your target). This may be used in conjunction with the mafia's factional attack, resulting in an attack power of 10.0x.

fields.name: Taxidermy (Passive):
fields.value: Choose an animal-themed role at the beginning of the game, You will appear to investigations as that role. Triggered when you score above 50%.
